SEARCH
Module SC2002FOMS
Package Interfaces

Interface IBranchManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
BranchManager
public interface IBranchManagement
The IBranchManagement interface provides methods for managing branches. It supports adding, setting the status of, removing, and printing branch details to a file, with each method capable of throwing an IOException due to I/O operations.
